grOOvy do this
press ctrl + alt + del, go to processes, right click DkII.exe --> CPU core usage(yadda ydadda), click use 1 core, not 2 as it is right now.

Ya i got the same problem as _antonK. If you minimize the game and bring it back up you can see part of the screen but part of it just stays black. Also, whenever i run the update or bonus pack, I can't run the game at all. I run Windows 7 if that means anything.

you guys need a specil patch to run this on windows 7 and vista.
search for it at rlslog.

for those on windows 7: You will need a NO CD crack, you will also need to modify the settings on the SHORTCUT: set to compatibility mode windows xp, disable visual themes and disable desktop composition.  Once in the game disable hardware acceleration in the graphics properties then load a level for the graphics engine to reboot and the changes to take effect. Downloading this now as the other one I downloaded appears to be the "silver" version which is known to crash for no apparent reason on level 4 of the campagne, just after the dark elf shows up in the dungeon
